<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>true</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_app_module</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Manages CLE-KMF app modules</name> <order>398</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
if (gs.getProperty('glide_encryption.cle_replatforming_with_kmf') == "opt_in") { current.addQuery('sys_id','!=','9d55886c0a0a0b1e00bedf0f2e0448b7');//sys_id of the Encryption Context's application module } else { current.addQuery('sys_id','!=','525fcf47c7100010ef4943c6f0976302');//sys_id of the Encryption modules' application module under Key Management current.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', '50cc742653700010cd1eddeeff7b12dc'); //sys_id of Field Encryption Settings }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-09-25 04:55:52</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>31177b1a0bc00010ef49eaf1a3673a2f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Manages CLE-KMF app modules</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Column Level Encryption" source="com.glide.encryption">837b12fb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d43e4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_31177b1a0bc00010ef49eaf1a3673a2f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-11-03 20:21:20</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=31177b1a0bc00010ef49eaf1a3673a2f"/> </record_update>
